Package org.apache.pivot.web.server

Contains classes to facilitate access to and development of web query services.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
ProxyServlet HTTP proxy that allows an unsigned applet to issue web queries to services outside of its origin server.
QueryServlet Abstract base class for query servlets.
QueryServlet.Path Immutable string sequence representing a query path.
 

Package org.apache.pivot.web.server Description

Contains classes to facilitate access to and development of web query services.
